Headline: #85 Central Temporary Northbound Reroute near Central/Fullerton-Altgeld
ShortDescription: NB 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Fullerton, Austin, Diversey and Central due to, street blockage near Central/Fullerton-Altgeld.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Fullerton, Austin, Diversey and Central due to, street blockage near Central/Fullerton-Altgeld.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Kimball. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Kimball.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
